name: mongo_lecture
description: Given the mongo delete lecture activity, convert the mongo-based addPerson ajax call to use the Postgres database. Youâ€™ll need to get PSQL running on your computer, set up a new database and create a table for the people as such: ``` CREATE TABLE people (   id serial NOT NULL,   name character varying(255) NOT NULL,   location character varying(255) NOT NULL,   age integer,   CONSTRAINT people_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) ); ```
author: Scott Bromander
